import React from "react"; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar.js'; import Footer from '../components/Footer.js'; import { Button, Card } from "shards-react"; import Layout from '../components/Layout.js'; export default class AssetPool extends React.Component { render() { return (

Interest Asset Pool

Join the pool and vote on which Crypto Asset the Consortium will use to purchase.

Current Pool Depth

DIA Pool 2399

Interest

The CAC pooled DIA earns interest through the Compound protocol for 2 weeks. At the end of 2 weeks the interest earned is automatically withdrawn through the CAC protocol.

Vote

CAC members nominate then vote on which assets to purchased. Nominations include a resale price and timeframe. After 2 days the nomination with the most votes will be set for purchase.

Acquisition

Through the CAC protocol the asset is acquired and immeiately put up for auction.

Auction

Asset are auction off on OpenSea marketplace. Once the sale is complete the proceeds are dispersed to CAC members.

); } }
